title: Meet Betsy Davos, Minister of Education of Tramp
subtitle: The nomination of Betsy Davos as Secretary of Education inspired an online idea detailing her alleged lack of qualifications for this work.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Donald Trump's candidate for the position of Minister of Education, billionaire Betsy Davis, has no education degree or teaching experience, never attended a public school or sent her children to a single school, and supports the funding of profit-making Christian schools for public schools; she obtained the job because she donated $9.5 million to the Trump campaign.
